name: The street runner
description:
Hello guys XGgamer is here with another hArDcOrE gAmE..............

On the streets boiz!!!!!!!!!!

Made for rishavscratchwork's scratch 2k gamejam

Scratch link - https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/553350335/

---------------------------The street runner-----------------------

1: Press any key or tap to change the lane

2: Don't touch the red stuff!

3: Thanks to mission impossible theme song (I just flipped it all)

---------------------------------Notes--------------------------------

1: If you found any bug please tell me that

2: lol the sprite art is piskely

3: pls like it supports me :)
